title: Ashaiyait-tIrppAi
sahitya:
Ashaiyait-tIrppAi paramA en pErAshaiyait-tIrppAi


anupallavi

  mAshilAp-pUraNa mAdhava siddhiyAl dEshattilE deiva dhIrarai AkkiDum


caraNam    unadu viN kuDai nizhal uyirkkum jIvargaLellAm uLLAnma nEyarAi uLLattil kaland-
unnai enadunadenbadinri ellAm un uDaimaiyAi inba cir-sbhainiyil anbuDan vAzhndiDum
